channel.title: Low power FOL classes
channel.description:
Here are some low power classes for FOL to reduce confirmability. Ideally there should be 3-5 of them, NOT more, and not 5 and down to 2 if there is the maximum amount of neutrals present. > # [color=steblue] Guard[/Color] > **BD Killing** **Risky moves(Passive) If someone else attacks your first target you will die, too(Will not be kept upon conversion).** **Halt! (Night, infinite Uses)** - Target two players, but not yourself. If the first player attacks the second player then you will attack the first player. You will only seen as targeting the first player.
Converts into [quote="Pug, post:37, topic:67608"] # [color=purple]The Sentinel[/color]
**[color=purple]Unseen Support[/color]** **Sentient Words (Night)** - Target Unseen player’s visits will be hidden tonight. - 2 uses **Ready Up! (Night)** - The Assassin’s kill tonight will bypass everything that may get in it’s way. - 1 use *Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and any Neutrals that seek to harm you.* [/quote] or [color=red]The Invoker(with 1 Cult Point)[/color]; Cult Alt for Risky Moves: Concentration(Passive) You cannot be imprisoned. Cult Alt for Halt! : Stop!(Night, 2 uses) Occupy your target.
> # [color=steblue]The Commoner[/color] > **BD Social** **Lynch Mob (Passive)** - If only two people are alive during the day, and no execution for treason has happened yet, and only one of these two has this passive then the other one is executed for treason.(This passive will be kept at all times, including during promotion.) **Petitition (Night, unlimited Uses)** - If you die tonight, and neither the King nor another Commoner (or Peasant) die, and the King is alive, your target(it cannot be the King) starts the day on trial, this will be an extra trial.
Converts into
> # [color=purple]The Peasant[/color] > **Unseen Social** **Hidden Allegiance(Passive)** - If you die by any means other than public execution you will show up as The Commoner. **Lynch Mob (Passive)** - If only two people are alive during the day, and no execution for treason has happened yet, and only one of these two has this passive then the other one is executed for treason.(This passive will be kept at all times, including during promotion.) **Petitition (Night, unlimited Uses)** - If you die tonight, and neither the King nor another Commoner die, and the King is alive, your target(it cannot be the King) starts the day on trial, this will be an extra trial.
or[color=red] The Apostle(with 1 cult point)[/color]
> # [color=steblue]The Spy[/color] > **BD Investigative** **Occupied(Passive)** If The Spy used a Day ability they cannot use a Night ability the following night. **Too Many Spies(Passive)** If more than one Spy targets the same person their abilities will fail to detect anything. **Stalk(Day, 3 uses)** If your target is a member of the Unseen, Cult, or a Neutral Killer they will be notified about your presence at the start of the night. If they kill or convert someone next night you will know(that they did it). If they target you they cannot be prevented. **Detect Conspiracy(Night, 3 uses)** Determine if the target is the newest converted, but not the oldest member belonging to The Unseen or The Cult(a lone member will return "No detection"). Will resolve **before** conversion.
Converts into [color=purple] The Nightwatch[/color] or [color=red]The Seeker(with 1 cult point)[/color]. Cult Alts: TMS- unusable. Stalk - Detect Screams(Day, 2 uses) Determine if your target killed someone tonight. Detect Conspiracy - Detect Hindrance(Night, 2 uses)If the Cult Leader fails to convert their target you will know who is responsible for it. Occupation takes precedence over visit prevention, which takes precedence over Conversion Immunity(e.g. If the CL is occupied while trying to convert the Prince then the prince is not responsible).
> # [color=steblue]The Whisperer[/color] > **BD Special** **Misdirecting Whisper(4 Uses, Night)** If the Mastermind or the Cult Leader visits your target, they will convert a random convertable Blue Dragon other than your target and yourself instead(This does not change visits). If that isn't possible the convert fails. **Allegiance Test(1 use, Night, Instant)**:Convert your target(if it is convertable) into the Cult or Unseen equivalent of their class. You will not notice any failures. The Unseen and Cult will not be able to convert someone tonight, or tomorrow, if your convert succeeds. Cannot be used Night 1.
Converts into
> # [color=purple]Voice of Evil[/color] > **Unseen Special** **The Voice(Night, Unlimited uses, 1 day cooldown)** Convert your target into the Unseen. Starts with a 1 day cooldown. Gets a 1 day cooldown if The Mastermind converts someone. Cannot be used if the Mastermind tries to convert someone. The Mastermind gets a 1 day cooldown to their conversion if yours succeeds.
or [color=red]The Seeker(with 1 cult point)[/color]
Cult Alts: Allegiance Test->Backup(Night, 2 uses) If the Cult Leader fails to convert their target, or is occupied, then your target is converted instead(if possible). Misdirecting Whisper is not avaliable.

And what’s more important it will not feel like a citizen because it HAS a night ability every night and that ability CAN have good impact if used wisely.

Converts into The Nightwatch or The Seeker(with 1 cult point). Cult Alts: TMS- unusable.
Stalk - Detect Screams(Day, 2 uses) Determine if your target killed someone tonight.
Detect Conspiracy - Detect Hindrance(Night, 2 uses)If the Cult Leader fails to convert their target you will know who is responsible for it. Occupation takes precedence over visit prevention, which takes precedence over Conversion Immunity(e.g. If the CL is occupied while trying to convert the Prince then the prince is not responsible).

item.title: Low power FOL classes
item.dc:creator: Unknown
item.description:
It isn’t supposed to be high power(the BD variant). Many other BD can also mess up something… if they make avoidable mistakes(or others make them)
And the Lynch Mob is powerful enough for a class that should not be that powerful. The night ability needs skill(or luck) to work properly.

That’s fine.

Do you have any comments about the other two classes?

Read full topic

item.title: Low power FOL classes
item.dc:creator: Unknown
item.description:
MaximusPrime:

Commoner is really useless though. . . Literally a slightly buffed citizen

Commoner is not useless.
Its opponents cannot risk a 1v1 against it; it wins even against an Evil King or Neutral Killer.
Yet when it is killed too early it might cause harm to evils.
It’s night ability might not seem that powerful, but forcing an extra trial on someone right at the start of the day can be quite powerful, although it is only as good as its user - randomly used, it is terrible. And it gives them something to do every night, which makes it more interesting.

Read full topic

item.title: Low power FOL classes

Lynch Mob (Passive) - If only two people are alive during the day, and no execution for treason has happened yet, and only one of these two has this passive then the other one is executed for treason.

This is so long just say that it wins 1v1s

Commoner is really useless though. . . Literally a slightly buffed citizen

Read full topic

item.title: Low power FOL classes
item.dc:creator: Unknown
item.description:
Pug:

Detect Conspiracy - Conspiracy(Night, 1 use) Allow the Cult Leader to convert any normally not convertable Neutral tonight. But it will have no cult points.

This is a big no. Neutral Killer just should not be convertable by any means. Leave convert immunes convert immune thanks.

Detect Conspiracy(Day, 3 uses) Determine if the target is the newest, and not the only member of The Unseen or The Cult.

One word. Just make it a night abil

Yeah ok, I get it. No Neutrals conversion. Maybe this version(I just added)?

Detect Conspiracy is not a Night ability because it is designed to conflict with the other day ability. I will clarify something, however.
Nevermind it makes it too powerful. Changed, and added a passive.

Read full topic

Head of State is a power on the King. It is not part of my suggestions.
